beginning: In a post-apocalyptic world, humanity is on the brink of extinction due to an ancient virus that has wiped out most of the population.
game.ending: The player's character, a skilled scientist, manages to develop a cure for the virus and restores hope to humanity.
game.synopsis: "Echoes of Eternity" is set in a world where time has broken down into fragmented timelines. The player must navigate through different eras, solving puzzles and battling enemies to prevent a catastrophic convergence of timelines that would erase all existence. As they progress, they uncover a deeper conspiracy behind the virus's origins and the true purpose of their mission.
game.title: Echoes of Eternity
